wikipedia_page.main: George Dilworth McGhee (25 May 1883 – 9 October 1944) was an English footballer who played as a forward in the early 1900s for Doncaster Rovers, Gainsborough Trinity and Southampton. By profession, he was a schoolteacher, but during World War I he was dismissed from the army after a court martial.

response: * George McGhee (media executive), British media executive; see 2009 in British television
